name: Chior
storyline: When you lose your most valuable sense combination of the rest has to do. Feel, scream, smell, manage. The game contains variety of senses implemented as mechanics for the game meant to aid the player throughout their journey. Feel: you feel around your surroundings in order to gather information from your current location. Smell: smell the environment around you in order to get a good indication of what kind of challenges may lay ahead. Scream: scream out loud in order to deter your foes as well as draw attention from others NPCs. Walk: Forwards, Backwards, Left, Right.
summary: You had a pretty rough fall. Trying to regain your composure you try to look around before realizing you can't see anything. Hope that your other senses will serve you better.
